author: Carl Sagan
quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.

author: Psalm 19:1
quote: The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.

author: Neil deGrasse Tyson
quote: For me, I am driven by two main philosophies, know more today about the world than I knew yesterday and lessen the suffering of others.

author: Star Wars
quote: The Force will be with you. Always.

author: Galileo Galilei
quote: I do not feel obliged to believe that the same God who has endowed us with sense, reason, and intellect has intended us to forgo their use.

author: Star Trek
quote: To boldly go where no man has gone before.

author: Stephen Hawking
quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet.

author: Isaiah 40:26
quote: Lift up your eyes and look to the heavens: Who created all these? He who brings out the starry host one by one.

author: Yoda, Star Wars
quote: Luminous beings are we, not this crude matter.

author: Ann Druyan
quote: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself.

author: Buzz Aldrin
quote: Mars is there, waiting to be reached.

author: Genesis 1:16
quote: God made two great lights—the greater light to govern the day and the lesser light to govern the night.

author: Spock, Star Trek
quote: The needs of the many outweigh the needs of the few.

author: Mae Jemison
quote: Never be limited by other people’s limited imaginations.

author: Edwin Hubble
quote: Equipped with his five senses, man explores the universe around him and calls the adventure Science.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.

author: Psalm 8:3-4
quote: When I consider your heavens, the work of your fingers, the moon and the stars... what is mankind that you are mindful of them?

author: Commander Shepard, Mass Effect
quote: We are all children of the stars, shaped by the cosmos, destined to reach out to the unknown.

author: Jocelyn Bell Burnell
quote: The sky is full of wonders we have only begun to explore.

author: Isaac Asimov
quote: There is a single light of science, and to brighten it anywhere is to brighten it everywhere.

author: Plato
quote: Astronomy compels the soul to look upward, and leads us from this world to another.

author: Marie Curie
quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: The universe is a picture of God's majesty, painted in stars.

author: Doctor Who
quote: We're all stories, in the end. Just make it a good one.

author: Wernher von Braun
quote: Research is what I’m doing when I don’t know what I’m doing.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: John Glenn
quote: To sit back and let fate play its hand out and never influence it is not the way man was meant to operate.

author: Psalm 147:4
quote: He determines the number of the stars and calls them each by name.

author: Laura M. Brotherson
quote: As we lift our gaze to the heavens, we remember that we are not alone in the vastness.

author: Captain Janeway, Star Trek: Voyager
quote: There’s a time to take chances, and there’s a time to be cautious. And this is a time for caution.

author: Captain Jean-Luc Picard
quote: It is possible to commit no mistakes and still lose. That is not a weakness; that is life.

author: Albert Einstein
quote: The most beautiful thing we can experience is the mysterious. It is the source of all true art and science.

author: Jane Goodall
quote: What you do makes a difference, and you have to decide what kind of difference you want to make.

author: Socrates
quote: Wonder is the beginning of wisdom.

author: Anaxagoras
quote: The sun is a mass of fiery stone, and the moon is a shining rock.

author: Sally Ride
quote: The stars don’t look bigger, but they do look brighter.

author: Plato
quote: Astronomy compels the soul to look upward, and leads us from this world to another.

author: T.S. Eliot
quote: We shall not cease from exploration, and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.

author: C.S. Lewis
quote: Look up with awe at the vastness of the heavens, and remember your smallness is not insignificance.

author: Vera Rubin
quote: Don’t let anyone keep you down for silly reasons such as who you are.
